analysis.key_quote: This rule flips that principle on its head. It asserts that employees in Schedule Policy/Career roles must 'faithfully implement administration policies' and that failure to do so—even in the absence of misconduct, justifies immediate dismissal.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of constitutional loyalty and the dangers of politicization, highlighting concerns about due process and the integrity of the merit-based system.
